dcterms:creator: Xue Bin Peng
Pieter Abbeel

dcterms:description: The DeepMimic framework is a state-of-the-art deep reinforcement learning imitation learning framework for physics-based character control, which allows for the generation of high-quality motions through example-guided learning.
dcterms:title: DeepMimic

dcterms:creator: Erwin Coumans
Yunfei Bai
dcterms:description: PyBullet is a Python module for physics simulation for games, robotics, and machine learning, providing a flexible environment for simulating physical interactions.
dcterms:title: PyBullet

dcterms:creator: Kevin Bergamin
Simon Clavet
Daniel Holden
James Richard Forbes
dcterms:description: DReCon is a dataset that enables data-driven responsive control of physics-based characters, allowing for the generation of realistic character behaviors based on motion data.
dcterms:title: DReCon

dcterms:creator: Josh Merel
Yuval Tassa
Dhruva TB
Sriram Srinivasan
Jay Lemmon
Ziyu Wang
Greg Wayne
Nicolas Heess
dcterms:description: The Motion Capture dataset is used for learning human behaviors through adversarial imitation, providing a rich source of motion data for training character control systems.
dcterms:title: Motion Capture
